channel.title: CVE Feed for Enphase -- IQ Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Enphase -- IQ Gateway

item.title: CVE-2024-21876|2024-08-12T15:38:58.808Z -- enphase -- iq%20gateway
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability via a URL parameter in Enphase IQ Gateway (formerly known as Envoy) allows an unautheticated attacker to access or create arbitratry files.This issue affects Envoy: from 4.x to 8.x and < 8.2.4225.

item.title: CVE-2024-21876|2024-08-10T17:44:50.205Z -- enphase -- iq%20gateway
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability via a URL parameter in Enphase IQ Gateway (formerly known as Envoy) allows an unautheticated attacker to access or create arbitratry files.This issue affects Envoy: from 4.x to 8.x and < 8.2.4225.
